entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
